item.description:
Sick of Turkey? Got all your shopping done on Black Friday? Time to relax with friends?

Well Join us at Krueger's Flatbread restaurant in Haverhill. Krueger's is the newest addition to Olivia's of Haverhill. Olivia's has received awards over the past 4 years, some of which are Boston's Best, Winnekeni Chowderfest and Phantom Gourmet. Krueger's is a special kind of Pizza shop, the pizza's are made in front of you so its like getting a show and a pizza.

We will meet and have a relaxing, enjoyable meal over some conversations with friends. If you would like to view the menu the link is as follows:

http://kruegerflatbre....

Remember during the Holiday season, we are collecting for Lazarus House and if you are due to pay your yearly dues please be prepared to pay at this event.

If you have to cancel at the last minute, get lost or are running late, please remember to call the Meetup phone (978-304-2811) to contact one of the organizers.

We hope to see you all at Krueger's for some awesome Pizza.

Donna & Janet smile
item.name: I am so sick of Turkey Dinner in Haverhill
